Structs/JSONCoder.html#/s:ZFV13Serializa.name: encode(_:)
Structs/JSONCoder.html#/s:ZFV13Serializa.abstract: Encodes a serializable expression as JSON data.

Structs/JSONCoder.html#/s:ZFV13Serializa.name: decode(_:)
Structs/JSONCoder.html#/s:ZFV13Serializa.abstract: Deserializes JSON data into an expression of the required type.

Structs/JSONCoder.html.name: JSONCoder
Structs/JSONCoder.html.abstract: Utility for encoding serializable values as JSON.

Protocols/Serializable.html#/s:FP13Seria.name: init(json:)
Protocols/Serializable.html#/s:FP13Seria.abstract: Initializes a new instance of a serializable type.

Protocols/Serializable.html#/s:FP13Seria.name: serialized()
Protocols/Serializable.html#/s:FP13Seria.abstract: Serializes an existing instance of a serializable type

Protocols/Serializable.html.name: Serializable
Protocols/Serializable.html.abstract: Protocol defining required methods for serialization and deserialization

Enums/DecodingError.html#/s:FO13Serializ.name: invalidType
Enums/DecodingError.html#/s:FO13Serializ.abstract: The actual type is not equal to the expected type.

Enums/DecodingError.html#/s:FO13Serializ.name: invalidValue
Enums/DecodingError.html#/s:FO13Serializ.abstract: The value is not in the set of allowed values

Enums/DecodingError.html#/s:FO13Serializ.name: missingKey
Enums/DecodingError.html#/s:FO13Serializ.abstract: The data does not contain a required key.
